Description: Student is unable to demonstrate personal creativity by making up any pose or movement of his own
Student can only demonstrate creative movement in a single step or movement with teacher's prompts
Student can make up his own arms for a sequence of steps
Student can only demonstrate creative movement in a series of steps by copying the teacher or peer's earlier demonstration
Student can create his own movements that have not been taught before and differ from standard hip hop moves
Student can create his own choreography
Student can create his own choreography and present it
